com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.bridge.impl

Class PHBridgeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.bridge.impl.PHBridgeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PHBridge

    public class PHBridgeImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PHBridge
    Abstracts bridge and its features

      • findNewLights

        public void findNewLights(PHLightListener listener)
                   throws com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.exception.PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Returns newly found lights around the bridge. The API call will search for 60 second or completion of the search process in bridge. Application can cancel the process by using cancelSearchNotification() defined in PHNotificationManager class.
        Specified by:
        findNewLights in interface PHBridge
        Parameters:
        listener - the PHLightListener anonymous interface to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.exception.PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if PHBridgeDelegator object is null.

      • updateLight

        public void updateLight(PHLight light,
               PHLightListener listener)
                 throws com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.exception.PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Updates the light corresponding to identifier using the information in the new PHLight object. Current version of Hue SDK supports updating name of Light.
        Specified by:
        updateLight in interface PHBridge
        Parameters:
        light - the PHLight object which gives new properties for light with light identifier.
        listener - the PHLightListener to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.exception.PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if light or PHBridgeDelegator object is null.

                       throws com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.exception.PHHueInvalidAPIException

        Specified by:
        deleteLightWithId in interface PHBridge

        listener - The listener to receive feedback on.
        Throws:
        com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.exception.PHHueInvalidAPIException - Thrown when this function is called on a bridge that does not support 1.2 or higher

      • updateSoftware

        public void updateSoftware(PHBridgeConfigurationListener listener)
                    throws com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.exception.PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Enables update Software process. Software update can only happen if user is connected to bridge locally through wifi router at home. portalService needs to be enabled in bridge configuration for software update to happen.

      • getSupportedTimeZones

        public void getSupportedTimeZones(PHTimeZoneListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: PHBridge
        Get the list of supported TimeZones from the bridge. This call is asynchronous, the call is made on demand, the list is not stored in the cache.
        Specified by:
        getSupportedTimeZones in interface PHBridge
        Parameters:
        listener - The callback interface
